title: Episode 98: Ft. Rico Love
itunes:title: Episode 98: Ft. Rico Love
description:
Singer/songwriter and record producer Rico Love stops by Lip Service and has some interesting conversation with Angela Yee, Gigi Maguire and Stephanie Santiago. He tells the ladies about his first orgasm, first time eating a girl out to how his friends finally pushed him to have sex at 17 years old. Angela talks about her "7 minute in Heaven" closet experience in middle school and how its still a joke. They also discuss the effects of having social media today, forgiving someones past, if you should charg
